rules_text:
When Namazu enters, it deals 4 damage to each other creature without flying and each player.
Namazu can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: [i]“I am one who manifests the presence of the most unholy and cataclysmic of all youkai, Taisui Xingjun. I am the legendary Supreme Catfish. I need but move and the earth itself will tremble, the lands on the surface will disintegrate. The likes of you cannot even begin to comprehend my power!”[/i]
